alert.note: Alert for Greene; Wayne (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued February 03 at 1:01PM CST until February 03 at 1:15PM CST by NWS Mobile
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 115 PM CST FOR WAYNE AND NORTHERN GREENE COUNTIES... At 101 PM CST, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 4 miles north of Clara to 4 miles northwest of Buckatunna to 13 miles southwest of State Line, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Waynesboro, Clara, State Line and Buckatunna. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 600 PM CST for southeastern Mississippi. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Continuous cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Move indoors immediately. Lightning is one of nature`s leading killers. Remember, if you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
